description: Apply inverse of "INVERT" transform to A007097, i.e.; the coefficients of the series [1/(1 + 2x + 3x^2 + 5x^3 + 11x^4 + 31x^5 + 127x^6 + 709x^7 ...
mathematica: CoefficientList[ Series[ 1/(1 + Sum[ NestList[ Prime, 1, n ] [ [ -1 ] ]*x^n, {n, 1, 17} ] ), {x, 0, 17} ], x ]
author: _Robert G. Wilson v_, Dec 11 2000
